Recruiting Subs

Athens Area School District is still looking for day to day subs and a few building based subs. Day to day subs can pick and choose their days through the ESS portal and a building based sub will work daily within the district. Pay rates for a day to day sub for the 2020 – 21 school year will be $115 per day. A building based sub will be paid at a daily rate of $135. Building based subs are guaranteed to work every day that school is in session. You do not have to have a teaching degree, but must have a college degree to take advantage of this. If you are interested, please call Maggie Merk at ESS 570.323.8561 ext.1088 or email her at MMerk@ESS.com

We will be providing updates on the status of this situation through our App, webpage and social media outlets as we receive information.
